articles.author: Joe Pinkstone
articles.title: Scientists develop an AI system that can measure your heart using smart SPEAKERS - Daily Mail
articles.description: The prototype, which was built in a lab but could be incorporated into commercial speakers in the future, was found to be almost as good as approved medial devices found in hospitals.
articles.content:
Amazon's Echo and other smart speakers like the Google Home could be used to monitor the rhythm of a person's heart. 
Academics created an AI-powered device which monitors regular, and irregular, he… [+6613 chars]
